alt: Naomi wearing a black knit sweater dress with no sleeves and a very low back.
description: Becoming a Revenant was not what Naomi expected, but it was indeed a fun adventure.

alt: Naomi wearing a black tank top and leather pencil skirt, with dark sunglasses.
description: By the end of this adventure, she and Johnny Silverhand became quite good friends.

alt: Naomi wearing a black sundress, her hair let down.
description: All of the farming and crafting eventually got to be a bit too tedious for her.

alt: Naomi wearing a black tank top and black skirt with skulls, tribal tattoos covering her sword arm.
description: Godwoken... something Naomi could have never anticipated.

alt: Naomi wearing a black training vest with black shorts, her hair in a high and tight ponytail.
description: Naomi's powers were unremarkable in this realm, but she held her own.

alt: Naomi wearing a black tank top with red accents, and a black miniskirt with a white hem.
description: Leading her small band of warriors was quite the thrilling experience.

alt: Naomi wearing a black corset top and black shorts, striking a fighting pose.
description: She met so many great people on this adventure, and even got to lead her own children into battle.

alt: Naomi wearing a white sleeveless dress, wielding a sword made of holy magic.
description: The clothing in this realm left much to be desired, but she did enjoy her shiny sword.

alt: Naomi wearing a black dress with purple sleeves and hem.
description: Breaking the Cycle proved to be quite the challenge, but Naomi made a few friends who proved quite helpful.

alt: Pixel-style Naomi wearing a purple trench coat, purple and white corset, and black shorts.
description: She wasn't thrilled about having to wear the boots.

alt: Naomi wearing a white corset with a long hem, and white shorts.
description: Fighting the Aragami proved to be a solid challenge, if not a bit repetitive.

alt: Naomi wearing a black sundress with purple bracelets and anklets.
description: Becoming a magical girl was remarkably fun, though Naomi didn't enjoy transforming back.

alt: Naomi wearing a black tank top and dark blue skirt.
description: Fighting alongside other heroes motivated Naomi to prove her skills even more.

alt: Naomi wearing a black tank top with a cat shaped window and a black miniskirt.
description: She gets up to all sorts of things when she's not adventuring.

alt: Naomi wearing a black Asian-style dress, her hair down.
description: Learning martial arts was fun, though she still prefers to hold a sword.

alt: Naomi wearing a black evening dress and black heels.
description: Stopping the Reapers was a rewarding task, but Naomi really enjoyed exploring the universe.

alt: Naom,i wearing a dark grey dress with leather straps, charging into battle with her sword.
description: From pauper to ruler, Naomi conquered the lands and liberated the people from constant fighting.

alt: Naomi wearing a black dress with a slit skirt that reveals her legs.
description: There were endless adventures to be had in this realm, and Naomi frequently revisits to find new ones.

alt: Naomi wearing a black dress with a low neckline and slits in the skirt to reveal her legs, brandishing a katana.
description: She absolutely loves Yokai, and fighting them while exploring more about their lore was one of her best adventures.

alt: Naomi wearing a black leotard and carrying a sniper rifle.
description: Exploring the new frontier was an interesting experience.

alt: Naomi wearing a black leather robe, holding her longsword.
description: The path that she walks is unique, but rewarding.

alt: Naomi wearing a black ruffled tank top and a black button-up skirt.
description: Founding her own gang was not something she had planned to do, but it was a nice change of pace.

alt: Naomi wearing a black cropped shirt and black leather skirt, standing in front of a purple neon halo and wings.
description: Getting dressed up for her next adventure had her excited and ready to go.

alt: Naomi wearing a black tube top and miniskirt.
description: Leading her gang into a new city came with its own challenges, but she was up to the task.

alt: Naomi wearing a ripped tank top and black miniskirt.
description: Being trapped in a simulation makes her wonder if all of life is actually a simulation.

alt: Naomi wearing a black trench coat with a white undershirt and black pants.
description: The world was an interesting fusion of magic and technology, and Naomi mastered both.

alt: Naomi wearing a black tank top and skirt.
description: Adventuring is fun, but taking some time to settle down for a bit is nice too.

alt: Naomi wearing a black sweater and miniskirt, brandishing her longsword.
description: Becoming Dragonborn was fun and all, but exploring the world was even better.

alt: Naomi wearing a black school-girl top and black miniskirt, striking a pose with her purple longsword.
description: Proving her talents in a fighting tournament was a fun way to spend her time.

alt: Naomi wearing a black robe and brown boots, carrying a glowing blue greatsword.
description: Leading armies into battle and helping the races of the world was fun.

alt: Pixel-style Naomi wearing a black dress with a red bow in her hair.
description: The farming was a nice change of pace, but the real fun was in meeting and befriending all of the village folk.

alt: Naomi wearing a black cross-style tank top and black shorts with a sash in the front, holding a purple lightsaber.
description: Even as a Jedi, Naomi found herself relying more on her sword skills than her Force powers.

alt: Naomi wearing a black tank top with a band logo and a black miniskirt.
description: Grinding on all of the rails in the city was one of her favourite ways to get around.

alt: Naomi wearing a black dress with black gloves, stockings, and boots.
description: She didn't get very far in this adventure before moving on to more entertaining worlds.

alt: Naomi wearing a black cybersuit, with her hair down, carrying a laser rifle.
description: Being called to a shooting tournament every so often is fun.

alt: Naomi wearing a black half coat and black miniskirt, her hair in pigtails.
description: Being chased out of her home town was not a good start to her day.

alt: Naomi wearing black leather armour and a gold tiara.
description: Naomi enjoyed hunting the kemono, but thinks hunting yokai is more fun.

alt: Naomi wearing a black tattered robe, holding her blade.
description: Fighting as a militia soldier and becoming a hero... Unexpected, but fun.

alt: Naomi wearing a black latex tank top with a heart window, and a black latex skirt.
description: She's not really into wrestling. She just wanted to try the outfits.

alt: Naomi wearing a black tank top, black shorts, and a black skirt with purple runes on it, holding an assault rifle.
description: Fighting off an alien invasion... She liked that more than she thought she would.

alt: Naomi wearing a black tanktop with a cat window and black tight shorts.
description: Waking up in a strange land with no memory of who she is or how she got there...

alt: Naomi wearing a white dancer outfit, with metal armour on her arms and legs.
description: Her entire family ripped away from her while she could only watch - now she seeks revenge.

alt: Naomi wearing a black cropped tank top and black leggings.
description: Hunting ghosts is absolutely terrifying, but the work must be done.

alt: Naomi wearing a pink crop top and pink shorts, with matching sandals.
description: Growing her power to become stronger than the gods themselves, Naomi will soon be unstoppable.

alt: Naomi wearing a white cropped blouse, red miniskirt, white stockings, and pink sandals.
description: Naomi might not be the best in the kitchen, but she'll give it her all!

alt: Naomi wearing a black wizard robe and a gold crown.
description: The crown seems to hold some sort of power, but Naomi can't tell if it's cursed or not.

alt: Naomi wearing a set of scale mail and holding a longsword.
description: She has yet to progress through this adventure.
